<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>

  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ILMoE</catalog>
            <entry>ILMoE1076</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Relief Organizations</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Entlastung Organisationen</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Organismes de Soulagement</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Organizações Do Relevo</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Organizzazioni Di Rilievo</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Οργανώσεις ανακούφισης</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Organizaciones De la Relevación</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Charitable organizations around the world always require funding to support their cause. In this activity the learners will investigate the origin, mission, accomplishments, and present needs of relief organizations around the world. They will be asked to present their findings to the class. A committee made up of learners from the class will judge the presentations and determine which organizations should receive additional funding.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">lesson plan</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">interactive activity</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">funding</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">charity</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">organizations</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Barmherzige Organisationen um die Welt benötigen
immer die Finanzierung, zum ihrer Ursache zu unterstützen. In 
dieser Aktivität forschen die Anfänger den Ursprung, die Mission, 
die Vollendungen und die augenblicklichen Bedürfnisse der Entlastung 
Organisationen um die Welt nach. Sie werden gebeten, ihre 
Entdeckungen der Kategorie darzustellen. Ein Ausschuß bildete 
von den Anfängern von der Kategorie beurteilt die Darstellungen und 
feststellt, welche Organisationen die zusätzliche Finanzierung 
empfangen sollten.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les organismes charitables autour du monde 
exigent toujours le placement pour supporter leur cause. Dans 
cette activité les étudiants étudieront l'origine, la mission, les 
accomplissements, et les besoins des organismes de soulagement autour 
du monde. Ils seront invités à présenter leurs résultats à 
la classe. Un comité a composé des étudiants de la classe 
jugera les présentations et déterminera quels organismes devraient 
recevoir le placement supplémentaire.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">As organizações charitable em torno do mundo 
requerem sempre financiar para suportar sua causa. Nesta 
atividade os learners investigarão a origem, a missão, as 
realizações, e as necessidades atuais de organizações do relevo em
torno do mundo. Serão pedidos para apresentar seus findings à 
classe. Um comitê compôs dos learners da classe julgará as 
apresentações e determinará que organizações devem receber 
financiar adicional.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Le organizzazioni caritatevoli intorno al mondo 
richiedono sempre costituire un fondo per per sostenere la loro causa.
In questa attività i principianti studieranno l'origine, la 
missione, le realizzazioni ed i bisogni attuali delle organizzazioni 
di rilievo intorno al mondo. Saranno chiesti di presentare i 
loro risultati al codice categoria. Un comitato ha composto dei 
principianti dal codice categoria giudicherà le presentazioni e 
determinerà quali organizzazioni dovrebbero ricevere costituire un 
fondo per supplementare.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Οι φιλανθρωπικές οργανώσεις σε όλο τον κόσμο απαιτούν
πάντα για να υποστηρίξουν την αιτία τους. Σε αυτήν την 
δραστηριότητα οι αρχάριοι θα ερευνήσουν την προέλευση, την 
αποστολή, τις ολοκληρώσεις, και τις παρούσες ανάγκες των 
οργανώσεων ανακούφισης σε όλο τον κόσμο. Θα κληθούν να 
παρουσιάσουν τα συμπεράσματά τους στην κλάση. Μια επιτροπή 
φιαγμένη επάνω από αρχαρίους από την κλάση θα κρίνει τις 
παρουσιάσεις και θα καθορίσει ποιες οργανώσεις πρέπει να λάβουν 
την πρόσθετη χρηματοδότηση.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Las organizaciones caritativas alrededor del 
mundo requieren siempre el financiamiento para utilizar su causa. 
En esta actividad los principiantes investigarán el origen, la 
misión, las realizaciones, y las actuales necesidades de las 
organizaciones de la relevación alrededor del mundo. Les 
pedirán presentar sus resultados a la clase. Un comité compuso
de principiantes de la clase juzgará las presentaciones y se 
determinará qué organizaciones deben recibir el financiamiento 
adicional.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Lektionplan</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">interaktive Aktivität</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Finanzierung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Nächstenliebe</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Organisationen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">plan de leçon</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">placement</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">charité</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">organismes</string>

          <keyword>
